name: CureDictionary
description: CureDictionary is your go-to online tool for quick, clear medical definitions. Explore and understand medical terms with ease.
creator: Leul Ayfokru
features: Quick and easy medical term search

security.data_encryption: All user data is encrypted using modern encryption methods to ensure privacy and security.
security.user_data_protection: User data is never shared with third parties without consent. Users have control over their data.
security.cookies: The website uses cookies to enhance the user experience, such as saving preferences like dark mode and search history.
security.https: The site uses HTTPS to ensure secure communication between the user's browser and the server.

dark_mode.description: Allows users to toggle between light and dark themes for a personalized viewing experience.
dark_mode.persistent: User preference for dark mode is stored in localStorage for future visits.

search_history.description: The website keeps a history of the user's search queries to allow quick access to previously searched terms.
search_history.persistent: Search history is saved locally in the user's browser and is not shared or stored on the server.
search_history.user_control: Users can clear their search history at any time by accessing settings.
